mapper.select: SELECT user_email , user_password , user_name , user_profile_picture , user_birth , user_addr , user_addr_detail , user_gender , user_mobile , user_job , user_is_receive_marketing , user_join_motivation , user_join_path , user_recommend_email , user_join_date , user_withdraw_status FROM user AS u WHERE u.user_email = #{userEmail};

SELECT user_email AS userEmail , user_password AS userPassword , user_name AS userName , user_profile_picture AS userProfilePicture , user_birth AS userBirth , user_addr AS userAddr , user_addr_detail AS userAddrDetail , user_gender AS userGender , user_mobile AS userMoblie , user_job AS userJob , user_is_receive_marketing AS userIsReceiveMarketing , user_join_motivation AS userJoinMotivation , user_join_path AS userJoinPath , user_recommend_email AS userRecommendEmail , user_join_date AS userJoinDate , user_withdraw_status AS userWithdrawStatus FROM user;
